sql.if: AND a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') or a.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%')

mapper.insert: insert into t_board ( board_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn) values (#{boardDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_board set board_div = #{boardDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, file_uuid = (CASE WHEN #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL OR #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' THEN file_uuid ELSE #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} END), upt_seq = #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upt_dt = now(), del_yn = #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where board_seq = #{boardSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select board_seq, board_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn from t_board where board_seq = #{boardSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select board_seq, board_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn from t_board

/* 공지사항 getBoardList */ SELECT a.board_seq ,a.board_div ,a.title ,a.content ,a.view_cnt ,a.file_uuid ,CONCAT( (SELECT CONCAT(#{mainUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '/', page_type) FROM t_file WHERE file_uuid = a.file_uuid), '/', (SELECT file_save_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid)) as image_url ,a.ins_seq ,a.ins_dt ,a.upt_seq ,a.upt_dt ,a.del_yn FROM t_board a WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY a.board_seq DESC

SELECT a.board_seq ,a.board_div ,a.title ,a.content ,a.view_cnt ,a.file_uuid ,(SELECT file_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid) as file_nm ,(SELECT file_save_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid) as file_save_nm ,CONCAT( (SELECT CONCAT(#{mainUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '/', page_type) FROM t_file WHERE file_uuid = a.file_uuid), '/', (SELECT file_save_nm FROM t_file_sub WHERE file_uuid_sub = a.file_uuid)) as image_url ,a.ins_seq ,ins_dt ,a.upt_seq ,upt_dt ,a.del_yn FROM t_board a WHERE 1=1 AND a.board_seq = ${boardSeq}
